item.title: Using yt-dlp to Download YouTube Videos
item.description: These past few days that I have been studying and learning a lot about Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, I have been able to read a lot of documentation, but I have also come across some interesting videos on YouTube. What is the problem with this? The main problem is that YouTube is known for having certain ease in deleting videos. That is why I have decided to use one of my favorite tools to save a local copy of these videos (just in case).
